description:
Silverway describes itself as an integrated provider of trading data and liquidity for private sale tokens. The platform reportedly provides professional investors with access to aggregated data and analytics on OTC transactions to support investment decisions and helps them to buy and sell private round tokens.
Silverway describes itself as an integrated provider of trading data and liquidity for private sale tokens. The platform reportedly provides professional investors with access to aggregated data and analytics on OTC transactions to support investment decisions and helps them to buy and sell private round tokens.
Silverway believes that it has introduced an effective solution to an unstructured and non-transparent market segment, unlocking $4B worth of locked value. The current ecosystem reportedly includes 750+ professional investors and hundreds of projects, and could potentially be opened up to more accredited market participants.
Silverway believes that it has introduced an effective solution to an unstructured and non-transparent market segment, unlocking $4B worth of locked value. The current ecosystem reportedly includes 750+ professional investors and hundreds of projects, and could potentially be opened up to more accredited market participants.
The platform was reportedly created in October 2018 by a team of former Goldman Sachs and Barclays Capital investment bankers and private equity professionals. The team aims to institutionalize the $4B private token sales market segment and make it more transparent and safe to invest.

name: Silverway
